A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen\, and this is including TPM. Terrible convoluted plot (Sandra Bullock/Keanu Reeves Speed bad). Honest one of the dumbest plots devices I’ve ever seen in a movie. The dialogue was the worst in any Star Wars movie. Failed attempt after failed attempt at one liners that fell flat and ruined otherwise dramatic scenes. Parts of the plot were completely pointless. At least 30 minutes of the movie were wasted on a plot line that didn’t matter. We get it you like Porgs... they were in WAY too many scenes. Rey’s parent reveal and what happens with Snoke were absolutely stupid\, and cr&@$ all over the questions fans had after force awakens. Luke was completely wasted the entire movie. I really hope Disney reconsiders using Johnson in the future\, I have no desire to watch any of them\, or even episode 9 now...
